properties.name: Square Chapel
properties.wheelchair:description:
Square chapel has a changing place
Diameters of the room are 2200 by 1500
Seat height 460
There is a pull chord 
H frame tracking 
Lever taps and door handle door 1 metre wide

properties.name: Thirteen Bar and Cafe
properties.wheelchair:description: Steps at front steps but having a ramp fitted.

properties.name: Caffè Nero
properties.wheelchair:description: Toilet dimensions: Floor space: 1600x2100mm Toilet height: 480mm Door width: 860mm handrail, pull cord

properties.name: Yates' Wine Lodge
properties.wheelchair:description: Can ask to use an access ramp to get up the two-staired elevated section. Toilet door dimensions: 890mm Toilet seat height: 410mm Floor space: 1800 x 1600mm Toilet difficult to turn in. Obstructions on the way in to toilet.

properties.name: The Barum Top Inn
properties.wheelchair:description: Upstairs balcony section inaccessible but main room is. Disabled toilet is 90 degrees around a corner so might be difficult to access with a wide chair. Inner doorway 830mm wide. Floorspace 1900mm x 1400mm.

properties.name: Bow Legged with Brass
properties.wheelchair:description: Only small sections inaccessible due to steps. Toilet doorway is 885mm Toilet floorspace: 1800mm x 1600mm Fully accessible facilities.

properties.name: The Duke of Wellington
properties.wheelchair:description: Toilet dimensions Floor space: 2000x1550mm Door width: 860mm Toilet height: 440mm

properties.name: The Gundog
properties.wheelchair:description: Ramp available for access in the back door but is quite steep.

properties.name: The Salvation
properties.wheelchair:description: Toilet door width 830mm. Toilet seat height 440mm. Floor space 1300mmx1700mm.
